response.job_title: Software developer |  React/Angular | FrontEnd architecture | ionic | Micro FrontEnd | AWS | Performance Optimization | SEO | Tech lead | CI/CD | testing/debugging/TDD
response.summary:
Master in Software Engineering and Mechatronics Engineer with a solid experience in software development using cutting-edge technologies. With more than 6 years participating in software solutions, I have contributed to the design and implementation of projects in complex environments of microservices architectures, micro front-ends, event-driven, serverless, IoT, among others.

I am a professional focused on the development of technological solutions that use best practices to achieve the requested quality levels. I have knowledge in TypeScript, AWS, GCP, CI/CD, TDD, BDD, microservices, micro front-ends, SEO, CRM, test strategies, automated testing, unit testing, design systems, Tailwind, Stencil, version control, React, Angular, Flask, ORMs, Docker, Webpack, SQL, GraphQL, NoSQL, Elasticsearch.

My achievements include optimizing load times of front-end applications that enable best SEO practices, as well as improving the user experience in systems that have led to an increase of users in portals or applications. I have successfully participated in the migration of monolithic systems to new architectures that guarantee their security, quality and maintainability, which demonstrates my ability to carry out ambitious projects from conception to successful deployment.

I am excited to continue to explore emerging technologies and face exciting challenges as I continue to contribute to the success of innovative projects in the future.
response.skills: React.js, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Arquitectura de software, Optimización para motores de búsqueda (SEO), Técnicas de optimización, Lenguajes de programación, Desarrollo front end, Angular, JavaScript, Web development, Gestión de proyectos, Metodologías ágiles, Planificación estratégica, Agile, Desarrollo web, Scrum, Desarrollo de software, Ui, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description:
- Migration from monolithic application to serverless architecture based on micro services and micro front-ends.
- Definition and development of libraries and design system for transversal use by the company's teams.
- Optimizations to the web portal to ensure search engine optimization (SEO).
- Software design using MVVM patterns to ensure project maintainability.
- Infrastructure definition for front-end application deployment using infrastructure as code in AWS.
profile_positions.title: Sr front end developer

profile_positions.description: GHL Hotels Group commercial management web application refactoring and mobile application development using Angular 8 and Ionic 5. Development of new functions for the company's Angular libraries. Client side implementation of ElasticSearch and Keycloack
profile_positions.title: Junior Web Developer

profile_positions.description: Development of web applications based on diverse technologies such as Angular, NodeJS, Ionic, Apache Cordova, MongoDB, and others, in order to optimize the company's operations and develop products to support the BMW training program
profile_positions.title: Multimedia Engineer

profile_positions.description: Technical support for computers. Relationship with providers. Technical specifications for CRM and other platforms. Web development assistant.
profile_positions.title: PC Technician- Tech Support

profile_positions.description: Math teacher, also responsible for the elaboration and analysis of multiple choice tests related to the area of mathematics in high school education in Colombia
profile_positions.title: Docente

profile_positions.description: Internship. Development of VBA macros for the analysis of data collected from hybrid and electric vehicle sensors. Development of control models for specific calculator modules.
profile_positions.title: Ingénieur développement systèmes embarqués

school.name: Ecole nationale supérieure de l'Electronique et de ses Applications

company.name: CarroYa
company.description:
Muévete por tu ciudad en tus propios términos.

Estamos construyendo un sueño, en el que todos podemos elegir la manera y las condiciones en las que queremos movernos en la ciudad y generar transformación en los modelos de ciudad a través de la tecnología. 

Aquí nos gusta dejar por un momento el rol y el cargo que tenemos y ponernos en los zapatos de las personas y así entender las razones por las que puede elegir comprar un carro, una SUV, una bicicleta, una Scooter y así hacer que sus motivaciones se transformen en soluciones de movilidad que sean robustas e impacten en la relación que tienen con la movilidad.

En CarroYa apostamos por una movilidad integral y por esto no solo ofrecemos productos o servicios, ofrecemos soluciones confiables, seguras e innovadoras. Estamos acompañando a nuestros aliados, socios y visitantes a hacer realidad sus sueños de movilidad.

El momento de unirte a nuestra compañía es ¡YA!
